#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;

int main() {
  int t;
  cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    string n;
    cin >> n;
    int k;
    cin >> k;
    int s = 0, p = 1;
    int m = n.size();
    for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
      s += (n[m - 1 - i] - '0') * p;
      p = (p * 10) % k;
    }
    cout << (s % k == 0 ? "YES" : "NO") << endl;
  }
}
